alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 10:47AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1047 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Crawfordville to Carrabelle. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Sopchoppy, Shadeville, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Arran, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Tully, Panacea, Shell Point, Medart, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn and Spring Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
